__e: Well, if I'm not addressing Crichton, then I address the neurochip in his head.
Crichton, I don't understand, what you're talking about!
I know you can hear me, Crichton, and I know you're scared.
Perhaps he's already aware Crichton and the others are down on the planet.
Have we got time to retrieve Crichton and the others?
John Crichton... made me a better captain.
Crichton is right. We may not have much time.
- I think the best thing to do right now is just to calm down... and figure this out.
Crichton... you might have noticed that at times I've... kept you at a distance.
It's a matter of priorities Crichton, you know which ship is more important.
Crichton, can't you see the damage he has done us?
Ah, Crichton went first and... and um...
And when the service is finished, everyone except Crichton went back up to their ship, and the Doc, he started the surgery.
Now I guess... that now Crichton's back... you'll head off with him again soon.
